nodes.text: Garrick Orion was a Human male who lived on Nova Orion Station during the time of the Galactic Civil War. He was one of the two founders of Nova Orion Industries, along with his old friend Jonas Nova. However, sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, they nearly split the organization due to their growing mutual suspicion and distrust.

Garrick Orion appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
